Description:
General Maintenance SupervisorSupervising a team of maintenance technicians and overseeing their work assignments and schedules.
Conducting regular inspections of equipment and facilities to ensure proper maintenance and identify potential issues.
Developing and implementing maintenance schedules, procedures, and protocols.
Maintaining accurate records of maintenance activities and generating reports as needed.
Ordering necessary parts and equipment and maintaining inventory levels.
Providing training and mentoring to maintenance technicians to ensure they have the skills and knowledge needed to perform their jobs effectively.Skills
Skills:
Well-groomed
Good Communication skills
Knowledge of Painting and Property Repair
Managing a team
